New Records: Niclas Füllkrug scored the winning goal for Germany in the 85th minute to secure a 2-1 comeback victory over Netherlands
Key Match Events: Germany comeback from a 1-0 deficit to win the match
Niclas Füllkrug's 85th-minute goal was the decisive moment of the match
Pre-Game Insights: The match was an international friendly
Germany was playing at home in Deutsche Bank Park, Frankfurt
Post-Match Reflections: Germany extended their winning streak to two matches
The match highlighted the depth and resilience of the German squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was broadcast live by Peacock
The attendance was 48,390 fans at Deutsche Bank Park
